title: SpaceX Can Fit Inside of an ETF. Why Don’t More Funds Hold It?
description: ETF’s are dabbling in private markets, but few are going as full-throttled on SpaceX as Rob Baron.
content: ETF’s are dabbling in private markets, but few are going as full-throttled on SpaceX as Rob Baron.
